creator: lilingv@yahoo.com.cn
text:
I noticed that zip task can deal with encoding problem very well, 
but unzip task doesn't. If the 
names of the file in the ZIP file
used an encoding other than UTF8, for example GB2312, Ant 
will
give an error message when unzip task is running.

A new optional encoding attribute for <unzip> is available starting with nichtly
build 2003-07-04.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
